english_example_sentence: Having thought carefully about the difficult problem, she found the solution
russian_example_sentence: Тщательно подумав о сложной проблеме, она нашла решение
turkish_example_sentence: Zor matematik problemini dikkatle düşünüp, akıllı öğrenci çözümü buldu
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Zor matematik problemini dikkatle ______, akıllı öğrenci çözümü buldu
